column5: This house has the most amazing view. You can sit on the back porch and rock while you look as far as you can. A beautiful lake is by you so you can watch a stunning sunset. House just remodeled so all appliances are new, marble master bath, large walk in showers. Walk in closet in master bedroom. Large open concept kitchen. Cable, internet, and fireplace.
column8: Gorgeous House on Cliff Fantastic Sunset Views
